If you are teaching at a high priority* school in California, you can have the state help you with fee support while going through your #NBCTstrong journey. You will receive $2,500 once you begin the process. Learn more

Mississippi provides an annual salary supplement of $6,000 to eligible National Board Certified Teachers for the life of the National Board certificate. In 13 counties, an additional $4,000 stipend is also available. Learn more #NBCTstrong

The National Council on Teacher Quality released a new resource, the Clinical Practice Action Guide, to help teacher prep programs, districts, and states ensure aspiring teachers enter the classroom ready to teach their students effectively from Day 1.

Read more from National Board Certified Teachers across the country. The National Board blog, The Standard, is a chance to read the voice of NBCTs across the country. Check out their tips, tricks, and stories to becoming #NBCTstrong
